item.title: By: matt white
item.dc:creator: matt white
item.description: <p>Of course it's worth it. Unfortunately I didn't have time to get one today so maybe I can get one at the weekend in Nottingham <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /></p>

item.description: <p>I bet I know the answer to that question!</p>

item.title: By: Declan Lynch
item.dc:creator: Declan Lynch
item.description: <p>Save your money, the iPhone you have does everything the new one does with two exceptions, the 3G speeds and GPS stuff but really.. is it worth spending the money for those two things alone.</p>
item.content:encoded: Save your money, the iPhone you have does everything the new one does with two exceptions, the 3G speeds and GPS stuff but really.. is it worth spending the money for those two things alone.
